author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LARGE PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTH-NORTHWESTWARD OFFSHORE SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN AND WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO...
summary: ...LARGE PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTH-NORTHWESTWARD OFFSHORE SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN AND WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 17.5, -107.4 with movement NNW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 17.5, -107.4 with movement NNW at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
